A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thoroughly enjoyed The Last Jedi! Great action\, phenomenal cinematography\, and a nice expansion on what we understand about the Star Wars universe. Rian Johnson did a great job with this one. There are some story elements that are weak or unnecessary but this comes with any Star Wars movie. I encourage anyone who is interested to see it for themselves and reach their own conclusion. Fun Fact: Empire Strikes Back was initially received with mixed reviews but now it’s considered the best film in the entire Star Wars saga.
